# Introduction

Vue Calendar Scheduler is a customizable calendar that allows you to display and create events with date, times and custom attributes.

# The Event model

An Event model is contained within the plugin to handle some under-the-hood logic without filling the objects provided by the developer with data they don't need. Any object provided in the [events] prop of the calendar will be transformed to an Event instance.

To learn more about the Event model check the Event model section.

# Callbacks

The calendar provides a few callbacks for user interaction events, such as clicking a day, a time or an event.

Check the callbacks section to learn more.

# Current Issues

  • Because of the new Event model, new Events can't be created without a startTime. This will be fixed in the next release with the introduction of Event model validators.
